name: Email OTP Authenticator
author: Chandan Shrivastava

sections.description:
Use this plugin to Login, Register and Verify users or guests by sending an email with OTP only. This is very FAST, FRIENDLY and SECURE technique.

F E A T U R E S :

Features For Registered Users :
* Login with OTP.
* Verify email to grant anything. (even without Login)
* Verify and redirect users. (even without Login)
* Lock any page/URL for verified users. (even without Login)
* Re-verify the Logged-in users to grant anything.
* Auto Log-out after wrong OTP attempts.

Features For Visitors :
* Register with email only.
* Verify email to grant anything. (even without registration)
* Verify and redirect visitors. (even without registration)
* Lock any page/URL for verified visitors. (even without registration)

Features For All :
* Set the OTP expiry time.
* Set the OTP sending Limit.
* Set wrong attempts Limit.
* Block unwanted email addresses.
* Block unwanted email providers.
* Allow specific email providers.

Operational Features :
* Manage popup template.
* Customize email to send OTP.
* Create Menus, Links or Buttons for popup.
* Operate through Menu editor, Shortcode or HTMLcode.
* Customize with our external functions and support code.
* Zero dependency on other APIs as Google/Facebook etc.
* Provide EASY and SECURE Login/Register/Verification features.

Additional Features :
* Provide subscriber/member’s facilities to your visitors even without an account on your website.
* Provide subscriber/member’s facilities to your registered users even without login into your website.
* Lock account anywhere with our OTP verification feature without session expiration or auto logout.
* Protect sensitive/important records even for your Logged-in users with re-verification feature.
* Provide two layers of security to your users with additional protection, verification and/or approval.

sections.installation:
Installing the plugin:

  1. Unzip the plugin’s directory into wp-content/plugins.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. The settings page will be available under settings menu (Settings >> Email OTP Authn)
sections.faq:
Can I use inline form instead of popup?

  • Not yet, but I am working on this feature to avail in the nearest version.

Can I login into WordPress admin using OTP?

  • Yes, you can login into WordPress admin by OTP(One Time Password).

Can I add login popup window on my website menu?

  • Yes, you can add login popup into your website menu by add a class name i.e emailotpauthn-popup in parent of login link.

Can I add verification popup window on my website menu or anywhere?

  • Yes, you can add login/verification popup into your website menu by add a class name i.e emailotpauthn-popup in parent of login/verification link.

Can I process the authenticator response after failed/success verification?

  • Yes, you can process login/verification popup response through jquery/javascript/php code at any where in your website.

Can A guest user register or verify his email?

  • Yes, this facility add in the plugin version 4.2.1 or above.
